subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray’s post-Australian Open slump shows no sign of ending. He was upset in his opening match at the Sony Ericsson Open by the American qualifier Alex Bogomolov Jr., 6-1, 7-5
snippet: Andy Murray’s post-Australian Open slump shows no sign of ending. He was upset in his opening match at the Sony Ericsson Open by the American qualifier Alex Bogomolov Jr., 6-1, 7-5
